verbose_text: M2 microglia exosome treatment increased miR-124 expression in neurons, and treatment of neurons with M2 microglial exosomes with miR-124 expression knocked down decreased miR-124 expression and reversed the neuroprotective effects of the exosomes, suggesting that M2 microglial exosomes exert their protective effect mainly via transfer of miR-124 to neurons, rather than by stimulating endogenous miR-124 expression in neurons.
